title: [Admission] Class start date for kcet round 3 Students
content: When does classes start for round 3 students? Do we get any orientation or anything? Are they gonna conduct extra classes for us to catch up with others?

comments.body: Yes you'll have extra classes everyday. We had no orientation or bootstrap, so probably you won't either. Start date idk, but likely 2-3 days after admission process ends.

Can I find those induction slides ? 

Like I saw bmsce students made a discord grp for people who miss these induction and all so they share the slides data photos and any related stuff so is there any such thing in pes ?
Yes there's a discord server, use the search bar n find the discord link.
